original_text: So Jehoiachin put aside his prison clothes and for the rest of his life ate regularly at the king’s table.
korean_text: 그 죄수의 의복을 갈아 입혔고 그의 평생 동안 항상 왕의 앞에서 먹게 하였으며

sentences.original_text: So Jehoiachin put aside his prison clothes
and for the rest of his life
ate regularly at the king's table
